references.paper_title: Communication-Efficient Learning of Deep Networks from Decentralized Data
references.reason: This is the seminal paper that introduced federated learning (FL), a crucial concept underlying the current work.
This paper introduced a key technique (Bayes by Backprop) for Bayesian neural networks that is used in the current work for efficient uncertainty quantification.

references.paper_title: Personalized federated learning with gaussian processes
references.reason: This paper is closely related to the current work as it introduces a Bayesian approach to personalized federated learning, addressing similar challenges.

references.paper_title: The Algorithmic Foundations of Differential Privacy
references.reason: This foundational paper in differential privacy provides the theoretical basis for the privacy guarantees given in the current work.

references.paper_title: WAFFLE: weighted averaging for personalized federated learning
references.reason: This paper tackles the challenge of heterogeneity in federated learning by proposing a weighted averaging approach, a concept relevant to the current work.
